item.title: What's next for Meta's metaverse
item.description: It's been three years since Facebook changed its name to Meta and went all in on the metaverse, and a decade since it purchased Oculus. What happened?

item.title: The Fed is on course to cut interest rates in December, but what happens next is anyone's guess
item.description: Friday's jobs report virtually cements that the Federal Reserve will approve an interest rate cut when it meets later this month.

item.title: Judge OKs landmark class action settlement in LGBTQ fertility lawsuit
item.description: Preliminary approval was given to a settlement between Aetna and same-sex couples in New York who alleged the health insurer denied them equal fertili...

item.title: Brian Thompson killing: Police believe person of interest left New York
item.description: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson was fatally shot Wednesday in midtown Manhattan. His company is one of the largest health insurers in the U.S.

item.title: Super Micro gets Nasdaq listing extension, says it can file financials by February
item.description: Super Micro said it received a letter from Nasdaq informing the company of the extension to stay listed.
